item.title: 3 Tips for Running SAS Queries on Oracle
item.description: I don’t know a whole lot about SAS, but in my current gig I am frequently called upon to tune queries that run in that environment. Here are some things to keep in mind when running queries and DML from SAS. Hello stuff stuff
